verses.roman:
bhojana kariyā kahe ānandita hañā
mātā āji khāoyāilā ākaṇṭha pūriyā

synonyms: bhojana kariyā—after eating; kahe—says; ānandita hañā—being very pleased; mātā—mother; āji—today; khāoyāilā—fed; ākaṇṭha—up to the neck; pūriyā—filling.
translation: "After eating the food, the Lord says, 'Today, mother has fed Me up to My neck.
